channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Woman Visits the Galápagos and All She Got Was This Exotic Eye Parasite
item.description: These flatworms are known to infect mammals like sea lions, but documented human cases are incredibly rare.

item.title: DJI isn't the only drone maker hit by new US laws – the world's first waterproof selfie drone could be next
item.description: It's not just DJI that's targeted by the US government's new rules on foreign-made drones – they look likely to send the promising HoverAir Aqua drone to Davey Jones' locker too.

item.title: À -40 %, ce puissant laptop 2-en-1 (écran OLED 120 Hz et Ryzen 7) est le super deal des soldes
item.description: Léger et convertible en tablette, le HP Envy x360 14 combine élégance et performance pour accompagner toutes vos tâches du quotidien. À l’occasion des soldes d’hiver, cet ultraportable complet voit son prix chuter à 782,39 €, au lieu de 1 299 €, chez Darty.

item.title: Soldes PC portables : voici les meilleures configurations gaming et bureautiques à prix soldés pendant la première démarque
item.description: Bureautique, gaming, AMD, Intel, Qualcomm, IPS-LCD, OLED... Les PC portables sont incontournables dans nos quotidiens, mais cela ne justifie pas de dépenser des mille et des cents pour ces appareils. Pendant les soldes d'hiver, voici les meilleures offres pour faire de réelles économies.

item.title: Cloudways in 60 minutes: The ultimate in simplified cloud hosting
item.description: One hour with Cloudways: 60 minutes with a top managed cloud hosting provider

item.title: Anker’s new AeroFit Pro 2 earbuds are already $30 off
item.description: We saw a ton of cool new products at CES 2026, but not all of them made the cut when it came to deciding what was best of show. One of those products that we nevertheless think holds promise is Anker’s AeroFit Pro 2, which are wireless earbuds that can double as open-ear headphones. You […]

item.title: The Year Ahead in Horror
item.description: If you hunger for monsters and thirst for blood, 2026 is going to be an excellently gruesome year on screens both big and small.

item.title: Silicon Valley Billionaires Panic Over California’s Proposed Wealth Tax
item.description: Larry Page’s apparent Florida move highlights how seriously the ultra-rich are taking a one-time tax aimed at extreme wealth inequality.

item.title: Cameroon vs Morocco Free Streams: How to watch AFCON 2025 quarter-final online from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Cameroon vs Morocco live streams for FREE from anywhere, as Man United's Bryan Mbeumo aims to knockout the host nation.

item.title: CES 2026 offered a lonely vision of the future
item.description: LG opened CES 2026 by outlining its vision to reduce the physical effort and mental burden of life. Buy enough of the devices it’s presently working on and you’ll exist in an environment of “ambient care,” coddled by the machinery in your home. It sounds positively utopian: When the sensors in your bed know you’ve not slept well and are getting a cold, a robot will wake you with a glass of freshly squeezed orange juice. When you’re in a rush to get to work, the robot will make you a sandwich for you to eat on the go, sparing you the effort of making it yourself. The more I roamed the halls of ...

item.title: Nvidia’s next-generation RTX 60 series GPUs rumored to be on track to launch next year
item.description: Nvidia’s next gen RTX 60 GPUs could arrive just in time for GTA 6’s PC port – but could the RAM apocalypse cause problems?

item.title: Engadget's best of CES 2026: All the new tech that caught our eye in Las Vegas
item.description: Over 4,000 exhibitors flocked to Las Vegas, Nevada this week to showcase their wares at CES 2026. The Engadget team, as usual, was out in full force covering the show. The week began with press conferences from huge companies at the show, mostly filled with AI buzzwords, vague promises and quite little in the way of hard news.More than one company even decided to forgo announcing things during their conferences to make way for more AI chatter, only to publish press releases later quietly admitting that, yes, actually, they did make some consumer technology. It's appropriate, I guess, that as ...

item.title: I just traded in my Polar running watch for a Garmin after learning a rather expensive lesson
item.description: Just because two devices should be compatible in theory, that doesn't necessarily mean they are.

item.title: Les Joy-Con de la Nintendo Switch 2 gagnent des nouvelles couleurs, mais un petit souci saute immédiatement aux yeux
item.description: Environ 6 mois après la sortie de la Switch 2, Nintendo annonce l'arrivée de deux nouvelles couleurs pour les Joy-Con de la console. Mais un souci saute immédiatement aux yeux.

item.title: Consoles portables : Intel veut revenir dans le jeu, mais part de très loin
item.description: Intel ne manque pas de culot. À l'occasion de la présentation des puces Core Ultra Series 3 durant le CES, le géant américain assure pouvoir reprendre à AMD la couronne des processeurs pour consoles portables. C'est audacieux, car Intel a absolument tout à prouver dans ce domaine.

item.title: Cost of Bank of England's Oracle migration set to triple
item.description: The Bank of England initially advertised a £7 million contract to help with its Oracle cloud migration – that's now up to £21.5 million.

item.title: On a vu le Mazda CX-6e : le plus beau SUV électrique est peut-être là, et il cache un secret chinois
item.description: Pour survivre dans l'électrique, Mazda a dû être pragmatique. Ce nouveau CX-6e repose sur une base technique chinoise, mais le design est pur jus japonais. Le résultat ? Un SUV imposant, une batterie LFP rassurante, et une gueule d'enfer. Reste à savoir si l'âme de Mazda a survécu à la greffe.

item.title: You can break apart and share this 10K power bank like a KitKat bar
item.description: Accessory maker Nimble announced a new power bank at CES 2026 that will appeal to anyone who's had to reluctantly share or loan their portable charger to someone else. The Champ Stack 10K looks like a typical 10,000mAh power bank that's jumped on the built-in charging cable bandwagon, but it has one interesting difference: you […]

item.title: Illicit Crypto Flows Climbed to $154 Billion in 2025 as Nation States Evade Sanctions, Report Finds
item.description: As the Trump administration is adding rocket fuel to sanction enforcement, it's also been legitimizing crypto.

item.title: Je suis monté à bord du Kia EV2, et j’ai trouvé que cette voiture électrique abordable pouvait battre la Renault 4 E-Tech
item.description: Kia s'attaque au marché des petits SUV avec son EV2, une voiture électrique calibrée pour se battre contre les Renault 4 E-Tech et Peugeot 2008. J'ai pu partir à sa découverte, voici mon premier avis.

item.title: « Nous achetons presque tous les PC » : face à la pénurie, cette boutique supplie ses clients de leur revendre leur vieille machine
item.description: La crise de la mémoire RAM oblige certains revendeurs à sortir le portefeuille pour garnir leur étagères. Tous ceux qui ont un PC à revendre sont courtisés.

item.title: GoFundMe confirms that a $1.4 million fundraising campaign for Renee Nicole Good is verified
item.description: The crowd-funding page appeared shortly after Good was fatally shot by an ICE agent in Minneapolis. It now has more than 50,000 donors. A viral crowd-funding campaign that has raised over $1.4 million and counting for Renee Good has been verified authentic, a spokesperson for GoFundMe told Fast Company.

item.title: X Didn’t Fix Grok's ‘Undressing’ Problem. It Just Makes People Pay for It
item.description: X is allowing only “verified” users to create images with Grok. Experts say it represents the “monetization of abuse”—and anyone can still generate images on Grok’s app and website.

item.title: Why are cybercriminals getting younger?
item.description: The suspects behind attacks are not veteran threat actors – they’re teenagers using Ransomware-as-a-Service tools to inflict multimillion-pound damage.

item.title: Comparatif : quelles sont les meilleures enceintes Bluetooth en 2026 ?
item.description: Compactes et nomades, les enceintes Bluetooth s'invitent partout : du salon à la plage, elles sont devenues indispensables. Bienvenue sur notre sélection des meilleurs modèles testés par nos soins.

item.title: All the tech and gadgets announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: Cloudflare and La Liga's conflict deepens as piracy legal battle continues
item.description: The conflict between La Liga and Cloudflare has escalated into a full-blown legal battle. While La Liga accuses the tech firm of acting as a "digital shield" for pirates, Cloudflare claims that blocking orders harm legitimate internet users.

item.title: NASA to make its first-ever medical evacuation from the International Space Station. Here’s why
item.description: A space mission is being cut short as a U.S.-Japanese-Russian crew of four will return to Earth in the coming days. In a rare move, NASA is cutting a mission aboard the International Space Station short after an astronaut had a medical issue.The space agency said Thursday the U.S.-Japanese-Russian crew of four will return to Earth in the coming days, earlier than planned.NASA canceled its first spacewalk of the year because of the health issue. The space agency did not identify the astronaut or the medical issue, citing patient privacy. The crew member is now stable.NASA officials stressed tha...

item.title: This Apple 25W MagSafe charger is on sale for only $30
item.description:
If you want a wireless charger for your iPhone and prefer to stick with Apple, Amazon has a sale that may pique your interest. The retailer is selling the one meter Apple Magsafe charger for $30, saving you $10 off the regular price, while also selling the two meter model for $40 ($10 off).
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone to get the fastest MagSafe charging speeds, the charger can wirelessly top up the battery of any iPhone from...

item.title: Trouvez réponse à vos questions | Boîte de réception
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies.

item.title: Plus de cernes et un cornichon : voici les 19 nouveaux emojis prévus pour 2026
item.description: Pour l’année 2026, ce sont 19 nouveaux emojis qui ont été présélectionnés, incluant un cornichon, un phare ou encore un visage marqué par la fatigue. Voici ce qui nous attend.

item.title: Discovery of Oldest Known Cremation in Africa Sparks Archaeological Mystery
item.description: A 9,500-year-old cremation site in Malawi is rewriting what we thought we knew about ancient funerals.

item.title: The 5 best gadgets IKEA announced at CES 2026 – including a smart version of my favorite lamp
item.description: The Varmblixt smart lamp was just the start - here are the 5 best things IKEA unveiled at CES 2026.

item.title: Industrial AI applied: where the real revolution is happening
item.description: While Big Tech chases trillion-dollar AI bubbles, industrial applications quietly prove genuine business value.

item.title: New Documentary ‘Starman’ Asks the Big Question: Are We Alone in the Universe? (Exclusive)
item.description: Watch the trailer for Robert Stone's cinematic portrait of NASA engineer and sci-fi author Gentry Lee.

item.title: CES 2026 was awash in bodily fluids
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. At CES 2026 this week, people […]

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (January 9)
item.description: From the return of hit shows to this year's Golden Globes ceremony, here's what you won't want to miss this weekend.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, January 10 (game #944)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, January 10 (game #1447)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Sharpa's ping-pong playing, blackjack dealing humanoid is working overtime at CES 2026
item.description: There were no idle hands at Sharpa's CES booth. The company's humanoid may have been the busiest bot at show, autonomously playing ping-pong, dealing blackjack games and taking selfies with passersby. On display wasn't just the robot and its smarts, but also SharpaWave, a highly dexterous 1:1 scale human hand. The hand has 22 active degrees of freedom, according to the company, allowing for precise and intricate finger movements. It mirrored my gestures as I wiggled my hand in front of its camera, getting everything mostly right, which was honestly pretty cool. Each fingertip contains a minica...

item.title: These molecules are remaking manufacturing
item.description: How catalysts and enzymes are becoming one of the most powerful and least visible forces in low-carbon manufacturing.

item.title: Processeurs PC portable : AMD affirme que sa puce Strix Halo « écrase » Intel
item.description: Vous pensiez qu'Intel avait plié le game avec son iGPU Arc B390 capable de rivaliser avec une RTX 4050 ? Pas si vite. AMD vient de réagir officiellement.

item.title: Amazon UK's big weekend sale is live — I've found the 18 best deals from £9.99
item.description: I've searched through this weekend's sale at Amazon UK and hand-picked the 18 best deals I'd recommend buying if you're hunting for a tech bargain.

item.title: Le « vaisseau spatial » de Hyundai passe à l’électrique : 20 min de charge, 9 places et un intérieur digne de la classe affaires
item.description: Présentée au Salon de Bruxelles, la version électrifiée du monospace coréen frappe fort. Attendue depuis quelques années par les familles nombreuses et les professionnels du transport de personne en quête de mobilité zéro émission, ce Staria Electric promet de bousculer un segment encore timide face à l'électrification.

item.title: Meta strikes nuclear power deals in support of its AI data centers
item.description: Meta signed deals with companies TerraPower, Oklo, and Vistra to help power its Prometheus data center. Facebook parent Meta has reached nuclear power deals with three companies as it continues to look for electricity sources for its artificial intelligence data centers.Meta struck agreements with TerraPower, Oklo and Vistra for nuclear power for its Prometheus AI data center that is being built in New Albany, Ohio. Meta announced Prometheus, which will be a 1-gigawatt cluster spanning across multiple data center buildings, in July. It’s anticipated to come online this year.Financial terms of ...

item.title: The new Anker 45W Nano charger with smart display from CES is $10 off already
item.description: Anker rolled out a bunch of new chargers and other gear at CES 2026, including a cute one that's already on sale. The new Nano charger with smart display, which is an upgrade to the existing Nano charger in Anker's lineup, is on sale for $30 right now while you can pre-order it. That's $10 off the regular MSRP, and shipments will start going out on January 20. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automati...

item.title: C’est la fin d’une galère sur Word : ajouter un lien devient instantané
item.description: Cette fois, ce n’est ni de l’IA ni un nouveau ruban « intelligent », mais une amélioration ultra-basique… et franchement utile. Microsoft vient de confirmer une petite révolution dans Word : ajouter un lien va enfin devenir aussi simple qu’un copier‑coller.
